Content: In case of a revolt loyalsit forces have to use the desiged
draf-patterns. Revolting forces may have their own (to avoid the player
forming a ''pitchfork-only''-pattern and suppressing revolts in that
way) unit-patterns. Both are equipped from the colonies arsenals
depending on the size of the revolt and a dice roll determinign how
lucky the revolter were at seizing the weapon stores.
